item.description:
AGENDA for September 11th BostonLOA Meetup

Hope everybody had a FUN, FUN, COOOOOL SUMMER!

Next Tuesday we'll be exploring ways to maintain and harness our
POSTIVE EMOTIONS to shift towards attracting more of what we want.

A thought without emotion behind it is just data. If you think a thought and back it up with emotion, it becomes a creative force. -- Neale Donald Walsch

Your thoughts are made up of words. Your words are usually associated with emotions and therefore generate positive or negative vibrations. Think "summer" and I bet a lot of us have very light, happy feelings. Think "winter" and I, for one, feel sadness and discomfort. Guess what vibrations you want to consistently give your attention, energy and focus to and sending out?

Chew-Hoong Koh, co-organizer of BostonLOA meetup, will facilitate the discussion of using various emotional guidance systems and mood shifters to fine tune your emotions to vibrate more positively and consistently on a daily basis. Let's learn and share how to turn up the volume on empowering creative emotions and pull yourself out of the negative ones that drag you down

Hussein Alhadi, realtor and BostonLOA member, will share with you a simple yet powerful way of acknowledging and releasing feelings around a negative or limiting belief and/or thought.
This basic releasing technique is used by some of the teachers of The Secret like Jack Canfield and Hale Dwoskin.

Thank you very much, Hussein for your willingness to share at our September meetup!

We look forward to re-connecting with everybody again next Tuesday.

ChewHoong and Dave


About Chew-Hoong Koh

ChewHoong's joy is to inspire and help transform quality of lives...one person, one family at a time...through living joyously with gratitude and being of service.

With contagious exuberance, she enjoys assisting both small and large businesses align and deepen relationships with clients through innovative marketing/ sales & business strategies and implementations.


About Hussein Alhadi

Hussein is a realtor, on a personal journey to be a life coach to serve & help people overcome their adversities & manifest their true desires. He is a graduate of the Sedona Method.
617-304-6162
Keller Williams Realty
www.husseinalhadi.com
hussein_alhadi2001@yahoo.com
